examples: we don't want the likes of you around here
We'll not see his like again
I can't tolerate people of his ilk

definitions.text: prefer or wish to do something
examples: Do you care to try this dish?
Would you like to come along to the movies?
She likes to read Russian novels

definitions.text: feel about or towards; consider, evaluate, or regard
examples: How did you like the President's speech last night?

definitions.text: resembling or similar; having the same or some of the same characteristics; often used in combination
examples: a limited circle of like minds
members of the cat family have like dispositions
as like as two peas in a pod
gave one six blows and the other a like number

definitions.text: having the same or similar characteristics
examples: friends are generally alike in background and taste
the like period of the preceding year
